product_name: The North Face Board Burrito Snowboard Bag - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Wrap up that snowboard in The North Face Board Burrito bag! It adapts to fit multiple sizes of boards and is constructed of sturdy fabric to keep your board protected. Clever fold-up system shores up any extra bag fabric with internal adjustments; when ready for travel, bag looks similar to the folded and tucked ends of a burrito. Tough polyester fabric resists the hard knocks of travel; bag can be folded up for compact storage. The North Face Board Burrito snowboard bag features multiple exterior grab loops and lash point to enhance travel. Closeout.
short_description: Wrap up that snowboard in The North Face Board Burrito bag! It adapts to fit multiple sizes of boards and is constructed of sturdy fabric to keep your board protected.
